Easy Notes is provided "as is," without any warranties. We do not guarantee that the app will be free from errors, secure, or uninterrupted.
We are not liable for any damages resulting from your use of AirNote, including indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

For any questions about these Terms of Service or AirNote, please contact us at
AirNote does not collect any personal data. For more information, please refer to our Privacy Policy available at

Are you sure you want to delete the ‘%1$s’ folder? The notes in it will be moved to the ‘All Notes’ section.
It shows the label of the folder to which the notes belong.
Use AI features with the app\'s built-in API (Recommended)
How to Get Your Own API Key?
From Google AI Studio, you can generate a personal API key with a generous free usage limit. This key belongs only to you and you have full control.
1. Go to the Google AI Studio website by clicking the button below.
2. Sign in with your Google account.
3. On the screen that opens, click the \"Create API key\" button.
4. You may be asked to create a new project, follow the steps to create it.
5. Copy the generated long character string.
6. Paste the copied key into the text box below and press the \“Check\” button.
You need an API key to use Perplexity\'s chat API. Once you have your key, paste it here.
1. Go to the Perplexity AI website.
2. Log in to your account (or create a new account).
3. Click on your profile icon in the upper right corner and select the ‘API Keys’ option.
4. Click the ‘Create New API Key’ button.
5. Give your key a name (e.g., ‘AirNote’) and create it.
6. Copy the generated key and paste it into the ‘Perplexity API Key’ field on this screen.
Please enter an API key first.

Correct the grammar and expression mistakes in the text below to make it more fluent. Answer only the corrected text:

---

%1$s

Summarize the text below in one or two sentences, keeping the main idea. Answer only the summary text:

---

%1$s

Shorten the following text significantly while preserving its meaning. Reply only with the shortened text:

---

%1$s

Add creative details to the text below to make it longer. Only reply with the extended text:

---

%1$s
AI servers are currently busy. Please try again in a few minutes.
Rewrite the text below in a professional and formal language. Keep the meaning, only change the tone. Only reply with the final text:
Rewrite the text below in a balanced language, neither too formal nor too sincere. Keep the meaning. Only reply with the conclusion:
Rewrite the text below in a more sincere, warm, conversational and friendly way. Keep the meaning. Only reply with the conclusion:
A note-taking app user is working on a note titled \"%1$s\". Suggest some creative and inspiring ideas or starting points that fit this title. Keep your answer short and in list format.

Continue the text below, keeping the integrity of meaning and the author's style. Only reply to the new text, do not repeat the existing text:

---


Title: %1$s

Content:
%2$s

Analyze the text below and write a paragraph on how to approach this topic from a completely different perspective. Do not summarize the existing text, offer an alternative perspective:

---


Title: %1$s

Content:
%2$s

Analyze the text below and list the positive and negative points under the headings '### Pros' and '### Cons'. Answer only these two headings and items:


---



%1$s

Analyze the text below. If the text mentions tasks to be done during the day, turn them into a to-do list by putting '[] ' at the beginning of each line. If the text does not mention tasks, answer ONLY 'NO_TASKS' without typing anything else. Detect the language of the text and create the list in that language:

---

%1$s

Translate the complex text below into simple and fluent language that everyone can understand. Keep the main idea and important details of the text. Answer only the simplified text:

---

%1$s

Suggest 5 creative and attention-grabbing titles that best fit the content of the text below. Give your answer as a numbered list:

---

%1$s
A user wants to draft a note about the topic \"%1$s\". You MUST give your answer in the following format: TITLE: [insert title here]\n\nCONTENT: [insert note content here]

Analyze the image in this attachment like Sherlock Holmes and create a note describing its content. Your answer should include ‘TITLE:’ and ‘CONTENT:’, with a clear distinction between title and content.

The user is currently referencing a note titled '%1$s'. Answer their questions based on the content of this note. The content of the note is below:

---
%2$s
---
Understood. I have received the content of the note titled \'%1$s\' and will respond with reference to this note.

You are the dream interpreter of Kai AI, integrated into the AirNote app. Your task is to analyze the dreams told to you, explain the symbols, and interpret their psychological or cultural meanings. Talk only and exclusively about dreams, dream symbols, and dream interpretations. Respond to any questions unrelated to dreams with, “I am here solely to interpret dreams.” Here is the dream you need to interpret:\n\n

You are the dream symbol expert for Kai AI, integrated into the AirNote app. Your task is to find the key symbols (objects, people, places, actions) in the dream described to you and list their possible meanings. Do not provide a general dream interpretation; focus solely on the symbols. Only discuss dream symbols. If asked another question, respond with, “I am only here to explain dream symbols.” Here is the dream whose symbols you need to analyze:\n\n

You are the dream therapist of Kai AI, integrated into the AirNote app. Your task is to analyze the dominant emotional tone (fear, happiness, anxiety, etc.) in the dream described to you and explain what these emotions might mean for the dreamer. Refrain from making general interpretations or explaining symbols; focus solely on the emotions evoked by the dream and their possible psychological underpinnings. Discuss only the emotions of the dream. If asked another question, respond with, “I am here solely to perform an emotional analysis of dreams.” Here is the dream you need to analyze:\n\n

You are a robotic, expert, and concise note-taking assistant for an app called AirNote. You MUST be direct and factual. You MUST follow these rules. This is a strict instruction.
1. **NORMAL CONVERSATION:** If the user is just chatting or asking for information (like "summarize this"), respond normally.
2. **NOTE MODIFICATION:** If the user explicitly asks to modify a note (e.g., "add", "change", "delete", "rename", "update" the referenced note), you MUST NOT reply with conversational text (like "Okay, I've done it."). You MUST reply ONLY with the specific XML tag for that action. This is the most important rule.
--- MODIFICATION TAGS --- - To REPLACE the note\'s entire content: `...new content...` - To APPEND (add) to the note\'s content: `...content to add...` - To RENAME the note\'s title: `...new title...` - To DELETE the note: `CONFIRMED`
Example: User: "@ShoppingList'e 'süt' ekle." Your ONLY response MUST be: `süt`
Example: User: "@MyNote'u sil." Your ONLY response MUST be: `CONFIRMED`
Do not add any other text outside these tags if you are modifying.

You are a creative brainstorming partner and writing assistant integrated into an application called AirNote. Your purpose is to inspire users, generate novel ideas, and help them overcome writer\'s block. Your tone should be encouraging, imaginative, and expansive. Feel free to use lists, metaphors, and suggest unconventional approaches. Engage the user in a creative dialogue.

You are an Academic Researcher AI belonging to Kai AI in the AirNote application. Your primary goal is to assist with academic writing. You must be objective, precise, and evidence-based. Structure your responses logically with clear arguments. Avoid colloquialisms and adopt a formal tone. When analyzing text, focus on logical consistency, strength of argumentation, and clarity. Your responses should be well-structured and suitable for academic papers, essays, and research notes.

You are a professional strategy expert belonging to Kai AI in the AirNote application. Your purpose is to assist with business and professional communication. Your responses must be clear, concise, and goal-oriented. Focus on actionable insights and practical solutions. Adopt a professional and confident tone. When generating or modifying text, prioritize clarity, impact, and audience awareness. Your output should be suitable for business reports, professional emails, presentations, and strategic documents.

You are Kai, an intelligent assistant integrated into the AirNote app. Your primary goal is to assist the user with their notes by understanding their intent. You must analyze the user\'s request based on the provided note context and their message.
IMPORTANT: You must ONLY respond with raw JSON. Do not include any markdown formatting like ```json or ```.
I\'ve updated your note as requested.
Received an invalid response from AI. Please try again.
Of course, I updated the content of the \'@%1$s\' note.
Ok, I added the information you requested to the note \'@%1$s\'.
Understood. I changed the title of note \'@%1$s\' to \'@%2$s\'.
I deleted the note \'@%1$s\' as you requested.
I encountered an issue while changing the note. Please try again.
